Text: Terremark Communications Group Cc Wright Vice Chairman of Terremark Communications market cap MM is planning to call you regarding energy outsourcing discussions recently begun between EES and Terremarks telecom carrier hotel subsidiary Telecom Routing Exchange Developers Inc TREX TREX is a developer and owner of carrier hotels that house telecom internet and broadband communications equipment Joe has previously served as Vice Chairman of WR Grace Co and served in Ronald Reagans cabinet as Director of the OMB I believe he wishes to speak with you to highlight his teams discussions with EES Tom Kalb Bundled Salesco x
